p: We found a single i.p. injection of SEB prior to IAV immunization to raise the frequency of splenic NP 147-specific T CD8 by dextramer staining ( Fig 1B). This could be translated, in terms of absolute numbers, to an approximately 3-fold increase over control values ( Fig 1C). The observed rise in NP 147-specific T CD8 was also clearly evident in the peripheral blood of SAg-pretreated animals ( Fig 1D).
